version_description:
Various Fixes Including:

Fix to allow video catalog to be displayed in upsideDown orientation on iPhones.
Display message and abort playback attempt if license server can't be reached.
Stop 30 second interval timer when video isn't playing.
Adding license server access test to diagnostics and playback sequence.
Better Portrait mode support.

Changed logo to a better graphic.
Removed embedded WebView - player now interacts with mobile Safari.
Moved processing of subtitles to speed up video load.
Fixed an issue when trying to play content with .wvm extension.
Fixed an issue with audio track display in the language options popup.

Fixed an issue with playback complete event.
New app icon.
Fixed an issue with subtitles.
Fixed issue with missing library on older devices.
